name: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse
desc: An intents handler's response to an update media affinity intent.

items.name: init(code: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

items.name: var code: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponseCode
items.desc: The code that indicates whether the app successfully updated the user's affinity for the media.

items.name: enum INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Codes returned by an intents handler in response to an update media affinity request.
